entry.content:
############################### Style ###############################

style:

cursor:

â€‹ enable: true

â€‹ text: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/inkss/common@master/cursor/text.png

â€‹ pointer: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/inkss/common@master/cursor/pointer.png

â€‹ default: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/inkss/common@master/cursor/left_ptr.png

â€‹ not-allowed: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/inkss/common@master/cursor/circle.png

â€‹ zoom-out: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/inkss/common@master/cursor/zoom-out.png

â€‹ zoom-in: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/inkss/common@master/cursor/zoom-in.png

â€‹ grab: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/inkss/common@master/cursor/openhand.png

font_smoothing: true # font-smoothing for webkit

max_width: 1080px # Sum of body width and sidebar width (This limit will be exceeded when the device width is greater than 2000px, reaching 75% of the total width)

scrollbar:

â€‹ size: 4px

â€‹ border: 2px

â€‹ color: â€˜#2196f3â€™

â€‹ hover: â€˜#ff5722â€™

navbar:

â€‹ height: 64px

â€‹ width: auto # auto, max

â€‹ effect: [shadow, blur] # [shadow, floatable, blur]

sidebar:

â€‹ effect: [shadow] # [shadow, floatable, blur]

body:

â€‹ effect: [shadow] # [shadow, floatable, blur]

â€‹ highlight:

â€‹ language: true # show language of codeblock

â€‹ copy_btn: true

â€‹ grayscale: false # Enable grayscale effect

â€‹ text_align: # left, right, justify, center

â€‹ h1: left

â€‹ h2: left

â€‹ h3: left

â€‹ h4: left

â€‹ p: justify

â€‹ note: # style for default note:

text

â€‹ icon: â€˜\f054â€™

â€‹ color: â€˜â€™

â€‹ checkbox:

â€‹ enable: true # enable for user

â€‹ color: â€˜â€™ # color for default checkbox

gap:

â€‹ h2: 48px # Spacing above H2 (only px unit)

â€‹ h3: 24px # Spacing above H3 (only px unit)

â€‹ h4: 16px # Spacing above H4 (only px unit)

â€‹ paragraph: .6rem # Paragraph spacing between paragraphs

â€‹ row: .4rem # Paragraph spacing between other elements

â€‹ line_height: 1.65 # normal, 1.5, 1.75, 2 â€¦

border_radius:

â€‹ card: 8px

â€‹ codeblock: 4px

â€‹ searchbar: 8px

â€‹ button: 4px

fontsize:

â€‹ root: 16px

â€‹ h1: 1.625rem

â€‹ h2: 1.375rem

â€‹ h3: 1.25rem

â€‹ h4: 1.125rem

â€‹ h5: 1rem

â€‹ h6: 1rem

â€‹ body: .9375rem

â€‹ list: .9375rem

â€‹ meta: .875rem

â€‹ code: .8125rem

â€‹ footnote: .75rem

fontfamily:

â€‹ logofont:

â€‹ fontfamily: â€˜â€œVarela Roundâ€, â€œPingFang SCâ€, â€œMicrosoft YaHeiâ€, Helvetica, Arialâ€™

â€‹ name: â€˜Varela Roundâ€™

â€‹ url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/volantis-x/cdn-fonts/VarelaRound/VarelaRound-Regular.ttf

â€‹ weight: normal

â€‹ style: normal

â€‹ bodyfont:

â€‹ fontfamily: â€˜UbuntuMono, â€œPingFang SCâ€, â€œMicrosoft YaHeiâ€, Helvetica, Arialâ€™

â€‹ name: â€˜UbuntuMonoâ€™

â€‹ url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/volantis-x/cdn-fonts/UbuntuMono/UbuntuMono-Regular.ttf

â€‹ weight: normal

â€‹ style: normal

â€‹ offset: 0.1rem # Correct baseline for zh-CN

â€‹ codefont:

â€‹ fontfamily: â€˜Menlo, UbuntuMono, Monacoâ€™

â€‹ # name: â€˜Monacoâ€™

â€‹ # url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/volantis-x/cdn-fonts/Monaco/Monaco.ttf

â€‹ # weight: normal

â€‹ # style: normal

â€‹ note-tag:

â€‹ fontfamily: â€˜Font Awesome 5 Freeâ€™

# color:

# site: â€˜#21232Fâ€™ # Website background color

# site_inner: â€˜#fffâ€™ # Text color inside the website background

# site_footer: â€˜#666â€™ # Footer text color inside the website background

# card: â€˜#444â€™ # Card background color

# text: â€˜#fffâ€™ # The color of the text on the card.

# # theme: â€˜#ff9800â€™ # Main color

# link: â€˜#1BCDFCâ€™ # Link color

# hover: â€˜#ff5722â€™ # Link highlight color

# inner: â€˜#333â€™ # Text color inside the button

# block: â€˜#555â€™ # Block color

# codeblock: â€˜#48371Aâ€™ # Codeblock color

# p: â€˜#cccâ€™ # Paragraph color

layout: dock # search (æœç´¢), dock (å), featured (ç²¾é€‰), focus (ç„¦ç‚¹)

# The following can be written in blog/source/_data/layout.yml

# æ–‡ç« åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆä¸»é¡µã€è‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼‰å¸ƒå±€

on_list:

â€‹ # read more button

â€‹ readmore: é˜…è¯»å…¨æ–‡

# é¡µé¢å¸ƒå±€

on_page:

â€‹ # æ–‡ç« é¡µé¢ä¸»ä½“å…ƒç´ ï¼Œä½ ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡µé¢çš„Front-matterä¸­è®¾ç½®

â€‹ body: [article, comments]

â€‹ # é»˜è®¤çš„metaä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œæ–‡ç« ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰é…ç½®åˆ™æŒ‰ç…§è¿™é‡Œçš„é…ç½®æ¥æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼Œè®¾ç½®ä¸ºfalseåˆ™ä¸æ˜¾ç¤º

â€‹ # å…¶ä¸­ï¼Œtitleåªåœ¨headerä¸­æœ‰æ•ˆï¼Œmusicå’Œthumbnailæ— éœ€åœ¨è¿™é‡Œè®¾ç½®ï¼Œæ–‡ç« ä¸­æœ‰åˆ™æ˜¾ç¤º

â€‹ # å¦‚æœtagsæ”¾ç½®åœ¨meta.headerä¸­ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆåœ¨poståˆ—è¡¨ä¸­ä¸æ˜¾ç¤ºï¼ˆå› ä¸ºå¡ç‰‡ä¸‹æ–¹å·²ç»æœ‰äº†ï¼‰

â€‹ meta:

â€‹ header: [title, author, category, date, pin]

â€‹ footer: [updated, tags, btns, share]

â€‹ # æ–‡ç« é¡µé¢çš„ä¾§è¾¹æ 

â€‹ sidebar: [qrcode, toc]

# æ–‡ç« å¸ƒå±€ï¼Œå‚æ•°ç»§æ‰¿è‡ª on_page

on_post:

# å…¶ä»–çš„é¡µé¢å¸ƒå±€æš‚æ—¶ç­‰äº on_list

meta:

# é“¾æ¥

btns:

â€‹ edit:

â€‹ title: åœ¨GitHubä¸Šç¼–è¾‘æ­¤é¡µ

â€‹ color: â€˜#888â€™

â€‹ repo: # æºç é“¾æ¥

â€‹ icon: fas fa-file-code

â€‹ title: æºç

â€‹ title: BUG

â€‹ icon: fas fa-question-circle

â€‹ title: ç–‘é—®

â€‹ color: â€˜#FFBD2Bâ€™

â€‹ idea: # å»ºè®®é“¾æ¥

â€‹ icon: fas fa-lightbulb

â€‹ title: å»ºè®®

â€‹ color: â€˜#3DC550â€™

â€‹ title: FAQ

â€‹ color: â€˜#29B1C9â€™

â€‹ feedback: # åé¦ˆé“¾æ¥

â€‹ icon: fas fa-comment-dots

â€‹ title: åé¦ˆ

â€‹ color: â€˜#1BCDFCâ€™

# widget library

widget:

# The following can be written in blog/source/_data/widget.yml

# â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

# blogger info widget

blogger:

â€‹ class: blogger

â€‹ display: [desktop, mobile] # [desktop, mobile]

â€‹ avatar: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/volantis-x/cdn-org/blog/Logo-NavBar@3x.png

â€‹ shape: rectangle # circle, rectangle

â€‹ url: /about/

â€‹ title:

â€‹ subtitle:

â€‹ jinrishici: true # Poetry Today. You can set a string, and it will be displayed when loading fails.

â€‹ social: true

# â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

# toc widget (valid only in articles)

toc:

â€‹ class: toc

â€‹ display: [desktop, mobile] # [desktop, mobile]

â€‹ header:

â€‹ icon: fas fa-list

â€‹ title: æœ¬æ–‡ç›®å½•

â€‹ list_number: false

â€‹ min_depth: 2

â€‹ max_depth: 5

# â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

# category widget

category:

â€‹ class: category

â€‹ display: [desktop] # [desktop, mobile]

â€‹ header:

â€‹ icon: fas fa-folder-open

â€‹ title: æ–‡ç« åˆ†ç±»

â€‹ url: /blog/categories/

# â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

# tagcloud widget

tagcloud:

â€‹ class: tagcloud

â€‹ display: [desktop, mobile] # [desktop, mobile]

â€‹ header:

â€‹ icon: fas fa-tags

â€‹ title: çƒ­é—¨æ ‡ç­¾

â€‹ url: /blog/tags/

â€‹ min_font: 14

â€‹ max_font: 24

â€‹ color: true

â€‹ start_color: â€˜#999â€™

â€‹ end_color: â€˜#555â€™

# â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

related_posts:

# â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

# copyright widget (valid only in articles)

copyright:

â€‹ class: copyright

â€‹ blockquote: true

â€‹ - æœ¬æ–‡çš„æ°¸ä¹…é“¾æ¥æ˜¯ï¼šhttps://www.starclouds.top/

# â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

# qrcode widget

donate:

â€‹ fancybox: true

# â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”â€”

# references widget

references:

â€‹ icon: fas fa-quote-left

â€‹ title: å‚è€ƒèµ„æ–™

# You can add your own widget here or â€˜blog/source/_data/widget.ymlâ€™

# class: text, list, grid, qrcode, page, â€¦ see more at https://volantis.js.org/

footer:

# layout of footer: [aplayer, social, license, info, copyright]

layout: [aplayer, social, license, info, copyright]

social:

â€‹ - icon: fab fa-twitter

â€‹ url: https://blog.csdn.net/m0_46439571

# site source

source: https://github.com/volantis-x/volantis-docs/

# site copyright

copyright: â€˜Copyright Â© 2017-2020 CallMe_starâ€˜

# You can add your own property here. (Support markdown, for example: br: â€˜
â€˜)

br: â€˜
â€˜

############################### SEO ###############################

seo:

# When there are no keywords in the articleâ€™s front-matter, use tags as keywords.

use_tags_as_keywords: true

# When there is no description in the articleâ€™s front-matter, use excerpt as the description.

use_excerpt_as_description: true

robots:

â€‹ home_first_page: index,follow

â€‹ home_other_pages: noindex,follow

â€‹ archive: noindex,follow

â€‹ category: noindex,follow

â€‹ tag: noindex,follow

â€‹ # robots can be written in front-matter

############################### Plugins ###############################

plugins:

################ required plugins ################

# jquery

jquery: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery@3.5/dist/jquery.min.js

################ optional plugins ################

# fontawesome

fontawesome: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free@5.13/css/all.min.css

# fontawesome animation

fontawesome_animation: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/l-lin/font-awesome-animation/dist/font-awesome-animation.min.css

# fancybox

fancybox: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@fancyapps/fancybox@3.5.7/dist/jquery.fancybox.min.css

######## Plugins to improve loading speed:

# Preload (The menuâ€™s url must end with â€˜/â€™)

instant_page: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/volantis-x/cdn-volantis@2/js/instant_page.js

######## Plugins to optimize the experience:

# highlight.js

highlightjs:

â€‹ js: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/highlightjs/cdn-release@9.18.1/build/highlight.min.js

â€‹ css: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/highlight.js@9.18.1/styles/solarized-light.css

â€‹ # more: https://www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/highlight.js?path=styles

# https://scrollrevealjs.org/api/reveal.html

scrollreveal:

â€‹ js: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/scrollreveal@4.0.6/dist/scrollreveal.min.js

â€‹ distance: 32px

â€‹ duration: 800 # ms

â€‹ interval: 20 # ms

â€‹ scale: 1 # 0.1~1

# Codeblock Copy Button

clipboard: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/clipboard@2/dist/clipboard.min.js

######## Plugins for SEO:

# Traffic statistics (very slow loading)

busuanzi: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/volantis-x/cdn-busuanzi@2.3/js/busuanzi.pure.mini.js

# npm i â€“save hexo-wordcount

wordcount: #true

######## Plugins for â€¦

# Button Ripple Effect

# Slide Background

â€‹ enable: true

â€‹ js: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/jquery-backstretch@2.1.18/jquery.backstretch.min.js

â€‹ position: cover # cover: sticky on the cover. fixed: Fixed as background for the site.

â€‹ shuffle: true # shuffle playlist

â€‹ duration: 20000 # Duration (ms)

â€‹ fade: 1500 # fade duration (ms) (Not more than 1500)

# APlayer is only available in mainland China.

# APlayer config: https://github.com/metowolf/MetingJS

aplayer:

â€‹ enable: false

â€‹ js:

â€‹ - https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/aplayer@1.10/dist/APlayer.min.js

â€‹ - https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/meting@2.0/dist/Meting.min.js

â€‹ - js/aplayer.js

â€‹ # Required

â€‹ server: netease # netease, tencent, kugou, xiami, baidu

â€‹ type: playlist # song, playlist, album, search, artist

â€‹ id: 3175833810 # song id / playlist id / album id / search keyword

â€‹ # Optional

â€‹ fixed: false # enable fixed mode

â€‹ theme: â€˜#1BCDFCâ€™ # main color

â€‹ autoplay: false # audio autoplay

â€‹ order: list # player play order, values: â€˜listâ€™, â€˜randomâ€™

â€‹ loop: all # player loop play, values: â€˜allâ€™, â€˜oneâ€™, â€˜noneâ€™

â€‹ volume: 0.7 # default volume, notice that player will remember user setting, default volume will not work after user set volume themselves

â€‹ list_max_height: 320px # list max height

â€‹ list_folded: true

pjax:

â€‹ enable: true

â€‹ timeout: 5000 # The timeout in milliseconds for the XHR requests. Set to 0 to disable the timeout.

â€‹ cacheBust: false # When set to true, Pjax appends a timestamp to skip the browser cache.

â€‹ animation: nprogress # nprogress, circle

# Valine

# https://valine.js.org/

valine: # è¯·å°† appId appKey ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºè‡ªå·±çš„ï¼Œå¦åˆ™è¯„è®ºæ•°æ®æ˜¯å…±äº«çš„ã€‚

â€‹ appId: # your appId

â€‹ appKey: # your appKey

â€‹ # js: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/valine@1.4/dist/Valine.min.js

â€‹ meta: nick,mail,link # valine comment header info

â€‹ requiredFields: [â€˜nickâ€™,â€™mailâ€™]

â€‹ enableQQ: true # Unstable avatar link

â€‹ avatar: robohash # gravatar style https://valine.js.org/avatar

â€‹ pageSize: 10 # comment list page size

â€‹ lang: zh-cn

â€‹ highlight: true

â€‹ visitor: true

â€‹ mathJax: false

# MiniValine

# https://github.com/MiniValine/MiniValine

minivaline:

â€‹ appId: # your appId

â€‹ appKey: # your appKey

â€‹ js: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/minivaline@3/dist/MiniValine.min.js

â€‹ mode: xCss # DesertsP or xCss

â€‹ math: false # Support MathJax.

â€‹ md: true # Support Markdown.

â€‹ enableQQ: false # Enable QQ avatar API.

â€‹ NoRecordIP: true # Do not record commenter IP.

â€‹ closeFlag: false

â€‹ closeUA: false

â€‹ region: false

â€‹ visitor: false # Article reading statistics.

â€‹ maxNest: 6 # Sub-comment maximum nesting depth.

â€‹ pageSize: 6 # Pagination size.

â€‹ barrager: 0

â€‹ role: admin

â€‹ cloudflag: false

â€‹ adminEmailMd5: de8a7aa53d07e6b6bceb45c64027763d # The MD5 of Admin Email to show Admin Flag.[ Just Only DesertsP Style mode]

â€‹ tagMeta: # The String Array of Words to show Flag.[ Just Only xCss Style mode]
